title: Globadyme
subtitle: Reduces transaction costs for companies by up to 50% per transaction.
reducing_cost_text: Due to the unique structure Globadyme adopts, we can reduce transaction costs by 50% per transaction.
payment_ways: In all the ways you need
payment_ways_text: Your customers can always Pay with their preferred Payment methods and desired currencies with Globadyme.
win_win_text: While reducing your transaction costs, we also make sure that your customers can always Pay with their preferred Payment methods and currencies.
what_we_do_title: The Future of Payments has arrived
what_we_do_text_1: Globadyme is a PSP that offers online companys the ability to accept payments with various methods & currencies, reducing transaction costs by 50%.
what_we_do_text_2: We offer the best prices & user experience with a simple onboarding process. We aim to propel the payments industry and provide complex insights while keeping it simple. We offer full transparency to ensure low transaction costs.
cta_text_1: Fill out the contact form, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
cta_text_2: We're looking forward to hearing from you!
